title: Checkout returns HTTP 500 error on mobile devices
recommended_action: Escalate to Payments Team. Collect logs, device model, OS version, and timestamp.

title: Password reset email not received
recommended_action: Check email service (SES/SMTP) status. Ask user for alternate email. Resend token.

title: Dashboard loads slowly for logged-in users
recommended_action: Capture network waterfall. Inspect DB slow queries. Escalate to Infra Team.

title: Unable to login due to invalid session token
recommended_action: Clear cookies. Reissue session token. Check authentication service logs.

title: Payment declined for valid cards
recommended_action: Verify payment gateway status. Request card BIN. Retry with alternate gateway.

title: Search results not loading
recommended_action: Check search microservice health. Validate query payload. Restart search worker.

title: Orders page displays blank screen
recommended_action: Check front-end JS console for stack traces. Roll back recent UI deployment.

title: Push notifications not received
recommended_action: Verify FCM/APNs token registration. Check app permissions. Validate push gateway health.

title: App crashes on startup for Android 11 users
recommended_action: Collect crash logs. Check ProGuard config. Escalate to Mobile Team.

title: Invoice PDF not generating
recommended_action: Check PDF generation microservice. Validate template engine. Retry with sample order.

title: Unable to update profile details
recommended_action: Check user-service validation rules. Reproduce with demo account. Inspect backend logs.

title: Two-Factor Authentication SMS not delivered
recommended_action: Verify SMS gateway uptime. Check phone blacklist. Regenerate OTP.

title: User receives repeated duplicate notifications
recommended_action: Check notification worker queue. Deduplicate messages. Inspect retry policies.

title: App data not syncing across multiple devices
recommended_action: Check sync cron jobs. Inspect conflict resolution logic. Escalate to Backend Sync Team.

title: Unable to upload profile picture
recommended_action: Validate file size/type. Check S3 bucket permissions. Retry upload with reduced resolution.
